Item.description: Frame Set, 3.2mm, 128-cell module, clear class II, RTV v2.0

AdditionalAttribute.name: Version Notes
AdditionalAttribute.value: 1) Each part has 5 associated files. 1x end extrusion (.pdf),1x end frame (.pdf), 1x side extrusion(.pdf), 1x side frame(.pdf), 1x incoming matl spec (.pdf). All extrusion drawing items should have 2 files (.pdf, .dwg) and all end/side frame drawing items should have 3 files (.pdf, .dwg, .igs). Note, a standard is set forth here to only associate .PDF drawing files to the parent frame set. ==> DONE2) Grounding holes on 001-68352 and 001-68354 are to be moved from 847mm to 785mm to match Gen2. Add straightness and twist requirements to all end frames. Update sheet tolerance on all Gen3 drawings to include X.XXX +/- 0.1mm. Add "NON-ANODIZE" to ground hole on 001-68353. ==> DONE3) Update all Gen2 silver & Gen3 drawings to reflect change ==> DONE4) Reduce the minimum specification for black frames from 20um to 18um to align with AAMA 611-98, Class I. This change will lower part cost by easing requirements on our suppliers. Change will require revision to all black frame drawings (Gen2 and Gen3; 72, and 96 cell;) and notification to all vendors. Since the change is a relaxation of current specifications the 'phase in' plan is simplified (i.e. all old parts would still adhere to the new specification). Change will also require updates to the frame material specification (001-42230) and incoming inspection (001-61085). Material specification update will require coordination with DMS because it is not controlled in Arena. This change is not considered to be a reliability risk as it still adheres to AAMA Class I, and exceeds the specification of our clear frames (AAMA ClassII, 10-18um). Quotes are required from suppliers to estimate cost savings. FAI for each MFG. is required prior to final approval. ==> DRAWINGS AND INCOMING INSPECTION UPDATED5) Add IGES for all end/side ==> DONE6) As part of change the material specification must be revised to reflect all ACTIVE frame parts, and all OBSOLETE frame parts must be removed. ==> INCOMPLETE
